content: Postpaid: Bills generated 1st of month, due by 15th. Late fee: LKR 150. Includes: monthly rental, usage charges, VAS, device installments, VAT 18%. E-bills via email/app. Paper bills: LKR 50/month.
Online: App, website, online banking. Wallet: FriMi, eZ Cash, mCash. Banks: All major banks. Service centers: Cash, card. Retail: Cargills, Keells. ATM: Selected banks. Auto-debit available.
MyLankaTel app > Pay Bill. Choose payment method (card, wallet). Confirm with OTP. Payment reflects within 15 minutes. Save card for future payments.
Day 1-7: Reminder SMS. Day 8: LKR 150 late fee. Day 21: Outgoing barred. Day 30: All services barred. Day 90: Number may be released. To restore: Clear dues + late fees + LKR 500 reconnection fee.
Amounts: LKR 50 (10% bonus), LKR 100 (20% bonus), LKR 500 (30% bonus + 50 SMS), LKR 1000 (35% bonus + 100 SMS + 20 mins). Validity: 365 days from last recharge. Bonus data valid 7 days.
Lite: LKR 2,000, Plus: LKR 5,000, Max: LKR 10,000, Unlimited: LKR 20,000. Increase requires 6+ months tenure, good payment history. Alerts at 80%, 90%, 100%.
Data: LKR 15 per 100 MB. Voice (any network): LKR 2/min. Voice (LankaTel): LKR 1/min. SMS: LKR 0.50. Activate boosters before exhausting package.
Zone A (India, Singapore): Data LKR 15/MB, Calls LKR 20/min. Zone B (UK, UAE): Data LKR 25/MB, Calls LKR 35/min. Zone C (USA, Europe): Data LKR 35/MB, Calls LKR 50/min. Roaming packs available.
Eligibility: Postpaid 6+ months, good history. Down payment: 20-30%. Tenure: 12 or 24 months. Interest: 0% (select devices) or 12% flat. Early settlement: no penalty.
VAT: 18% on all services. Business: VAT invoice available. Tax queries: finance@lankatel.lk or 1236.
Access via app/website: 24 months available. Download PDF bills. For older bills (>24 months): email billing@lankatel.lk. Bills retained 7 years.
Eligible: Billing errors, duplicate payments, service not delivered. Request via 1236 or service center. Investigation: 48 hours. Refund within 5 business days to original payment method.
Call 1236 with bill reference. Investigation: 5-10 days. If valid: credit on next bill. Pay undisputed portion to avoid service interruption. Escalate to TRC if unresolved.
Online: App, website, banking. Offline: Service centers, agents, retail, post offices. USSD: *#123#. Wallets: Instant. Scratch cards: Dial *#123*PIN#. Min: LKR 20, Max: LKR 10,000.
App > Billing > Auto-Pay > Add Card > Enable. Options: Cards, bank debit, wallets. SMS 3 days before debit. Ensure sufficient funds to avoid LKR 500 failed payment fee.
Instant: Cards, wallets, app. 15-30 min: Debit cards. 1-2 days: Bank transfers, standing orders, branches. 3-5 days: Cheques. International: Instant-24 hours.
Enroll via app > Billing > Go Paperless. Verify email. Benefits: Bills 3 days earlier, LKR 50 credit, monthly 500MB bonus, 24-month archive. Revert requires 30-day notice.
App > Gift Data or *#131*recipient*amount#. Options: 500MB (LKR 25), 1GB (LKR 45), 2GB (LKR 85), 5GB (LKR 200), 10GB (LKR 380). Valid 7 days. Max 50GB/month.
Consolidated billing, department allocation, custom billing dates, volume discounts. API integration available. Contact corporate.billing@lankatel.lk or 1237.
Instant SMS confirmation. Email within 5 min. Digital receipt in app. Download as PDF. Request detailed receipts for expense claims via app or billing@lankatel.lk.
